dimensions: Warp x Weft: 297.5 x 101 cm (9 ft. 9 1/8 in. x 39 3/4 in.)
title: Sarong
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave; mordant printing and painting, resist printing and direct application of dye using blocks for red, blue and purple; yellow possibly applied by brush
description: Field is a small scale all over floral pattern in diamond shaped units on a deep purple background; side borders are floral patterns; end borders are 4 pendant bands on dark red, rose and deep purple backgrounds.
name: Sarong
